ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: EQ Cost
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard that Sony has a subscription plan that lets you sub to multiple games or something. I forget what it s called, but I saw it on their website one day. I
ygData.messageBody:
I heard that Sony has a subscription plan that lets you sub to multiple
games or something. I forget what it's called, but I saw it on their website
one day. I might consider trying EQ2. I wish I could get on their beta
testers list.
luv,
-Su

Me, personally, I plan on getting EQ2 as soon as it comes out, for as you
said, I'd like to be there from the start. However, I will not stop playing
EQ1 either. I have two computers. :) One for EQ one for EQII. and if I
have to, I'll build another one! MUWAHAHAHAHA!!!

Not that I'm addicted or anything... no... not me... addiction? dont know
the meaning of the word?

who says I'm addicted?

Wulfric "show me the platinum!" Rennison
